name: Beer Ranger
description: Logic platformer in the Oldschool style. The dwarfs are on a quest to find as much beer as they can. Only smart mind and skillful hands will bring them to the desired goal. Will you manage to beat the most hardcore levels?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 95/98/ME/2000/XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Pentium 3 CPU Memory: 256 MB RAM Storage: 25 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 2 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD equivalent Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 25 MB available space
